citations.narrative:
Shelter box in Pen #3 (left lower pasture): The shelter box for 3 golden retrievers has roof damage. The roof is bowed
inward but intact. The front support board is broken and hanging downward. All structures of the primary enclosure must
be kept in good repair. The shelter box must be repaired to ensure it is structurally sound and to prevent injury to the
dogs. Correct by March 31, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Shelter box in Pen #3 (left lower pasture): The shelter box for 3 golden retrievers has roof damage. The roof is bowed 
inward but intact. The front support board is broken and hanging downward. All structures of the primary enclosure must 
be kept in good repair. The shelter box must be repaired to ensure it is structurally sound and to prevent injury to the 
dogs. Correct by March 31, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
